document_data.name: Sithe
document_data.mainbody: '''Sithe''' was a half-[[genasi]], half-[[demon]] [[fighter|warrior]] who worked as an enforcer for the [[Dead Rats]] gang in [[Luskan]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1410}} Although she was half-demon, she very much disliked being referred to as a demon.
document_data.Description: Sithe had black skin and black eyes. Rather than hair, she had tendrils of darkness leaking from her scalp.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3251}} She usually dressed in black silks.
document_data.Abilities: Sithe could open a portal to the void whenever she liked. She was an expert swordswoman and was even capable of defeating Kalen whom she often sparred with.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1938}}
document_data.Possessions: Sithe carried a large black [[axe]] and was very proficient in its use.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|1265}}
